mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_name, user_gender, user_phone, user_id_card, user_is_verified, user_account, user_password, user_location) VALUES
( #{user.userId}, #{user.userName}, #{user.userGender}, #{user.userPhone}, #{user.userIdCard}, #{user.userIsVerified}, #{user.userAccount}, #{user.userPassword}, #{user.userLocation} )
